section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Header file for image processing from micrograph structures.

formalpara.title: Author
formalpara.para: Bernard Heymann

formalpara.title: Date
formalpara.para: Created: 20000426
Modified: 20210722

section.title: image_type()

para.para: Converts an image type string to a standard form.

entry.para: a string with a type definition.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: Bstring standard type definition. The input string is converted to the following strings: mg micrograph frame micrograph frames rec reconstruction part particle fil filament ps power spectrum ft Fourier transform

formalpara.title: Returns

section.title: particle_read_img()

para.para: Reads a particle image file.

entry.para: flag to indicate reading the data.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: Bimage* image (NULL means failure). The file name is taken from the particle record by preference, otherwise from the micrograph record.

section.para: Definition at line 1046 of file mg_img_proc.cpp.

section.title: project_bin_micrographs()

para.computeroutput: int project_bin_micrographs (Bproject * project, int bin, Bstring mgpath, Bstring partpath)

para.para: Bins all micrographs a project.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: int 0. All micrographs in a project are binned by the indicated value. New micrograph file names are generated with a "_b<n>" insert, where the n indicates the bin value. The path to the binned micrograph can be specified.

section.para: Definition at line 1923 of file mg_img_proc.cpp.

section.title: project_catenate_micrographs()

para.para: Concatenates all micrograph image files into one file.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: int 0. The new file name is the common part of the original micrograph file names.

section.title: project_change_pixel_size()

para.computeroutput: int project_change_pixel_size (Bproject * project, Vector3< double > new_pixel_size, Bstring mgpath, Bstring partpath)

para.para: Changes all the micrograph fields linked to the pixel size.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: int 0. The fields linked to pixel size are: pixel_size shift box, bad and marker radii particle origins and locations bad area and marker locations

section.title: project_check_particles()

para.para: Checks particle numbers and box sizes.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: int error code (<0 means failure). Reads each particle file header, checks the number of particles and sets the box size for the micrograph.

section.para: Definition at line 1085 of file mg_img_proc.cpp.

section.title: project_create_from_image()

para.para: Creates a project structure using image file names.

entry.para: type of images: mg, frame, rec, part, fil.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: Bproject* new project parameter structure. The function sets up the project hierarchy from one image base on the type. If the type is not specified, it is guessed based on the following rules: #sub-images = 1 z=1 => micrograph z>1 => reconstruction #sub-images > 1 z=1 => frames z>1 x=y => particles xâ‰ y => filaments

section.para: Definition at line 495 of file mg_img_proc.cpp.

section.title: project_create_from_images()

para.para: Creates a project structure using image file names.

entry.para: type of images: mg, frame, rec, part, fil.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: Bproject* new project parameter structure. The function sets up the project hierarchy from a list of file names. Each file may represent a micrograph or a picked particle file. If the image is equal or larger than 1024x1024, it is assumed to be a micrograph, its name will be assigned as a micrograph file name, and no particle tags will be added. If the image is smaller than 1024x1024 or the make_part flag is set, it is taken to be picked particles and the file name will be assigned as a particle file name.

section.title: project_flip_particle_coordinates()

para.para: Reverses one or more particle coordinates.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: int 0. The specification of axes to flip is embedded in the flip number: first bit - x second bit - y third bit - z

section.title: project_reset_origins()

para.para: Resets particle origins to nominal values.

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: int 0. For each micrograph a particle image header is read and the origin is set to to the middle of the image.

section.title: project_set_part_img_origins()

para.para: Writes particle origins into particle image files.

formalpara.title: Author
formalpara.para: D. Belnap

formalpara.title: Returns
formalpara.para: int error code (<0 means failure). Sets the origins (offsets from the first voxel) in an image header to values set within a project. Rewrites image to file.
